instruction: Explain the benefits of using public transportation
output: Using public transportation has many benefits. It is far less expensive than other means of transportation, such as driving or flying, and it also helps to reduce pollution by getting more cars off the road. Public transportation is also a convenient, stress-free way to get around. You don't have to worry about traffic, finding parking, or navigation – it's all taken care of by the bus or train. It also helps reduce your carbon footprint, as public transportation tends to be the most energy-efficient way to get around.
